title: A Kind of seeing: the colour of Scotland
creator_credit: IFA (Scotland), Films of Scotland and Edward McConnell
brief_description: An abstract colour impression of Scotland throughout the four seasons of the year. The camera focused on flowers, the surface of ponds and the winter sky. There is no commentary, the background music was composed by Frank Spedding.
